binding:binding.name: Bluetooth Binding
binding:binding.description:
A binding for Bluetooth devices.
Supports the following features:
  • Automatic discovery of Bluetooth adapters and devices
  • Managing Bluetooth adapters (multiple adapters supported)
  • Monitoring availability of Bluetooth devices (whether they are in range of bluetooth adapters)
  • Comprehensive support for BLE enabled (Bluetooth Smart) Bluetooth devices. Mapping Bluetooth GATT services/characteristics/fields into openhab channels.
  • Robustness in maintaining connectivity (automatic connection recovery)
binding:binding.author: Vlad Kolotov

parameter.name: gatt_extension_folder
parameter.label: GATT services and characteristics extension folder
parameter.description:
A folder on the system disk which contains your custom definitions for GATT services and characteristics for automatic recognition of GATT characteristic fields.
See more: https://github.com/sputnikdev/bluetooth-gatt-parser
Example: /home/pi/.bluetooth_smart

parameter.name: update_rate
parameter.label: Update rate of bluetooth devices
parameter.description: How often Bluetooth devices are checked/updated (seconds)?

parameter.name: initial_online_timeout
parameter.label: Initial online timeout
parameter.description: Bluetooth devices not showing any activity are considered to be offline after exceeding this timeout (seconds). Can be customized for each Bluetooth device.

parameter.name: initial_connection_control
parameter.label: Initial connection control
parameter.description: If enabled, connection is kept on for newly added Bluetooth devices, otherwise off. Can be customized for each Bluetooth device.
